DOC.brief_summary: This project aim prove efficacy safety food base solution prevent vitamin D deficiency high risk population Caucasian South Asian origin live Denmark .
DOC.brief_title: Food-based Solutions Optimal Vitamin D Nutrition Health
DOC.detailed_description: The study 12 week double-blinded , randomised , placebo-controlled food-based intervention trial real-life setting . 140 ( 18-50 ) woman risk vitamin D deficiency Caucasian South Asian origin . The two ethnic group woman randomise two group . One receive vitamin D fortify food receive kind food non-fortified . Foods give study period free charge participant hand every second week . The food egg , yoghurt , cheese crisp bread . The study include baseline visit final visit , visit blood sample draw , anthropometrics , muscle strength , dietary background questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: 1850 year old woman Low consumption fish fish product Low intake vitamin D contain supplement No use sun facility No plan sunholiday October 2015 May 2016 Pregnancy breastfeed Menopause Serious disease ( cancer , server liver kidney insufficiency , sarcoidosis granulomatous disease ) medicine affect vitamin D metabolism ( steroid , antiepileptic , thyroid hormone , bisphosphonates , oestrogen ) .
